constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KTCAAP Name: Kingston Town Centre AAP
KEYACH Name: Kingston Town Centre Key Area of Change

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Highways and Transport

decision_conditions: The information submitted is of insufficient detail to clearly demonstrate that the terms of the condition have been met.Further information showing the predicated noise levels in each of the relevant rooms should be submitted. You cannot rely on data submitted in support of previous applications.If the required levels cannot be met with windows open appropriate acoustic ventilation should be provided so that the room can be sufficiently ventilated. The acoustic performance of any passive vent, variable speed mechanical air supply unit or whole houseventilation must be sufficient to ensure that the noise level standards given above are not compromised.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 20 (A scheme of noise insulation/reduction) of planning permission 20/00702/FUL (Alterations and extensions associated with the change of use from student accommodation to provide 63 Co-living residential units with shared communal living space at the basement, ground and roof levels; part of existing ground floor retail floorspace  changed to coffee shop (A1/A3) (open to public between 7am to 6pm daily, with resident use only outside these hours)/common area (for resident use only); relocation of refuse stores and staircase at ground floor to create 3 Co-living units; extension at fourth floor level to enclose existing roof terrace to provide 2 Co-living units and formation of roof level terrace)
